programme.desc: Soccer Scout Anne heads to Istria, Croatia to be the maid of honor at her friend’s wedding. There, a talented 12-year-old player catches her attention, but she has no idea that his father was no other than her childhood sweetheart.

programme.title: Risks And Side Effects
programme.desc: When Pilates trainer Kathrin needs a new kidney, her husband’s hesitation to be her donor results in a crisis in their marriage. Faced with issues of life and death, the fragility of the couple’s relationship is laid bare.

programme.title: Murder in Mont St. Michel
programme.desc: A seemingly mystical murder takes Captain Sophie back to Mont-Saint-Michel, her childhood home and where her father is buried. She meets an exorcist priest and is annoyed by his silence but she's far from suspecting that a weighty secret unites them.

programme.title: Karakol
programme.desc: After recently losing her father, Clara discovers a passport, foreign bills and letters while going through his things. Suspecting that he is living a secret life, she embarks on a trip to Karakil, a lake in Tajikistan, to find out the truth.

programme.title: Joy Of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: A Summer In Mykonos
programme.desc: A mother-daughter vacation turns into a surprise for Jana when her mother Susanne unexpectedly sets up a meeting between her and her father, Jens. As Susanne tries to secretly rope Jens into funding Jana’s studies, Jana seeks solace with the kindly Nikos.

programme.title: Kuma
programme.desc: After being tricked into becoming the second wife of a Turkish man in Vienna, the naïve Ayse accepts her fate and even develops a close friendship with Fatma, the first wife. With Fatma dying of cancer, Ayse has to take over her marital duties.

programme.title: Roise & Frank

programme.title: ASIA

programme.title: Karakol
programme.desc: After recently losing her father, Clara discovers a passport, foreign bills and letters while going through his things. Suspecting that he is living a secret life, she embarks on a trip to Karakil, a lake in Tajikistan, to find out the truth.

programme.title: A Summer In Mykonos
programme.desc: A mother-daughter vacation turns into a surprise for Jana when her mother Susanne unexpectedly sets up a meeting between her and her father, Jens. As Susanne tries to secretly rope Jens into funding Jana’s studies, Jana seeks solace with the kindly Nikos.

programme.title: Roise & Frank
programme.desc: Recently widowed Róise is struggling with her grief following her husband's passing. However, when a stray dog starts to follow her around, she starts to believe that it might be the reincarnation of her husband.

programme.title: ASIA
programme.desc: Motherhood has not been easy for Asia, a single mother whose teenage daughter, Vika, barely interacts with her. But when Vika’s health deteriorates rapidly, Asia must step in and become the mother Vika so desperately needs.

programme.title: The Little Comrade
programme.desc: During Stalinist tyranny, 6-year-old Leelo’s mother is sent to a prison camp. Haunted by her mother’s last words telling her to be a good kid, Leelo vows to be on her best behaviour in the hope that it will bring her mother back.

programme.title: All My Friends Hate Me
programme.desc: Pete is cautiously excited about reuniting with his college crew for a birthday weekend. But, one by one, his friends slowly turn against him. Is he being punished, is he paranoid, or is he part of some sick joke?

programme.title: Victoria Must Go
programme.desc: Hedvig and Henrik's new stepmother Victoria is annoying and constantly introducing new rules. They decide to hire a hitman to get rid of her, and end up persuading a very reluctant immigrant, Carl, to do the job.

programme.title: Codename Holec
programme.desc: Honza films the Russian invasion of 1968 in Prague and takes the politically charged movie and actress Eva, the love of his life, on a secret trip to Vienna. There they meet a director who knows Eva very well and the Czech Secret Service even better.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Taurus 1
programme.desc: When a bank adviser is found dead, fears of terrorist attacks drives Secret Service Officer Tarkan to ask the police for help. Inspector Mehmet Özakin is sent to work with him to investigate a case laced with corruption, blackmail, and illegal trafficking.

programme.title: Oskar & Lilli: Where No One Knows Us
programme.desc: Chechen siblings Oskar and Lilli face deportation from Austria but are separated in foster care after their mother’s suicide attempt. Meeting in secret, the siblings hold onto hope that they will reunite as a family someday.

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: Latin For All
programme.desc: Delphine, a disillusioned Latin teacher, made a deal with her class of 5 lazy students: if they keep quiet, they’ll all receive A grades without having to learn anything. Unfortunately, this qualifies them for a Latin competition taking place in Naples.

programme.title: Murders in Porquerolles
programme.desc: The lifeless body of a painter is found on a beach in Porquerolles. Her body at the foot of the cliff evokes the Lycastre, the famous dragon from the legend that gave the bay its name. A rigid prosecutor and a whimsical policewoman team up to investigate.

programme.title: Playmaker
programme.desc: A former footballer and jailbird, Ivo is no longer interested in football. That is until he meets Lukas, a talented young player, and decides to help him pursue a professional career. But his criminal past soon catches up with him.
